location.address: Rua Professor Sousa Barros, Vila Guarani, Zona Sul

basics.name: Vinicius Rodrigues Lima
basics.summary: I'll positively impact the world we live! An entrepreneur at soul, and a software engineer who is concerned with the deadlines without losing the art and software quality.

work.company: Innovatino Lab - Hospital Israelita Albert Einstein
highlights: Served as backend (Node) and mobile (Android) lead developer on innovation lab projects
Designed, implemented RESTful API (Node and PHP) for lots of mobile and browser apps
Delivered lectures on Android and built repos allowing team to get started fast by reusable modules.
Wrote many unit tests, e2e tests, api tests (Android: JUnit, Mockito, espresso. )
Tools used in the projects: RxJava, Retrofit, Butterknife, UIL, Dagger2
work.summary: A Lab turn innovative ideas into real!

work.company: Innovatino Lab - Hospital Israelita Albert Einstein
highlights: Wrote many telemedicine (camera based) android apps
Mentored junior developers on Java (Android), JavaScript (Angular and Node) and PHP (Laravel)
Deployed many applications that rely on main amazon services: EC2, ElasticBeanstalk, S3, Route53, Lambda, SNS, SES
work.summary: A Lab turn innovative ideas into real!

highlights: Pedágios Brasil Android Application - 20k users from Play Store
Vanzeiro Android Application - Delivering van providers request from customers
work.summary: Marketplace that aims transform and boost rental vans market.

highlights: Refactored the main engine of acquiring location from Android applications.
Created from scratch the most recent ZoeMob web panel (Single-Page Application based on Javascript with Backbone)
Served also as backend developer ( Proprietary framework using PHP, MySQL, REDIS, CASSANDRA and Memcache )
Wrote many unit and integration tests ( for both Android and Backend )
work.summary: A 10 million users startup that provides an assistance tool that fits in the palm of your hand and helps dads, moms, and kids to locate each other, get organized, and communicate.!
